TopicTitle: Clickthrough on stock dialogues in the VAB and SPH

Articles.Content: As the title says, clickthrough on dialogue boxes occurs during vehicle construction, this is borderline game breaking, as it can cause massive memory usage due to Ctrl-Z-ing, screwed up offset and rotation, and totally borked staging

This could be related to the various competing UI systems currently in play, KSP has three different UI systems running

Part of the (upcoming) 1.1 update is reworking/rebasing the entire UI system so it all runs off the (Unity 5) stock UI system

Hopefully that should mean these oddities get addressed
Didn't HarvestR (or someone else) say that this will be fixed in 1.1?

They know about this already guys, it's been reported many, many times and as the whole GUI is being replaced it'll be a moot point.

Closing this one.
